form.email_hint: Personal emails not allowed (Gmail, Outlook, etc.)
form.email_blocked: Must use a corporate email (Gmail, Outlook, etc. not allowed)
form.phone_hint: Only for WhatsApp messages if necessary (we won't call)
form.project_summary_placeholder: Briefly describe what type of solution you need, technologies involved, estimated scope, etc.
form.special_requirements_label: Is there anything special you need clarified in the commercial proposal?
form.special_requirements_placeholder: Warranty, Post-production maintenance, license costs, payment terms, technical support, etc.
form.special_requirements_hint: Optional field - Help us better customize your proposal
form.pdf_required: Must attach a PDF file with requirements
form.privacy_notice: Your information is secure and we will only use it to generate your commercial proposal. We commit not to share it with third parties, and you can request deletion of your data at any time.

footer.ai_description: Our specialized AI, assisted by an engineer from our technical team, will generate the complete and personalized commercial proposal
